member.name: M:XamarinCRMv2DataService.MobileServiceInitializer.Seed(XamarinCRMv2DataService.Model.MobileServiceContext)
member.summary: Use this method to populate the data context with data.

member.name: T:XamarinCRMv2DataService.Controllers.BaseController`1
member.summary: A base controller, to assist in implemting XML documentation for the API, and to abstract away the common Initialize() method of the controllers.
member.typeparam: The type of EntityData that the inheriting controller will be bound to.

member.name: T:XamarinCRMv2DataService.RefreshOrdersJob
member.summary: Reresh the dates on the orders. Via the Azure dashboard for the service, add a new scheduled job called RefreshOrders. The scheduler will link to the RefreshOrdersJob class by convention ([Your]Job).
